import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { ngOnInit(): void { if (!localStorage.getItem('foo')) { localStorage.setItem('foo', 'no reload') location.reload() } else { localStorage.removeItem('foo') } } }

Welcome To Collection Plateform

Welcome to our Collection Platform, a sophisticated solution designed to streamline and enhance the charge collection process across multiple locations. Our platform provides a seamless experience for administrators and users, offering efficient tools for location management, transaction tracking, progress monitoring, and communication. With user-friendly features, we empower organizations to optimize their charge collection systems, ensuring a smooth and productive experience for all stakeholders. Join us in revolutionizing the way charge collection is managed, where efficiency meets excellence.













If you are a student

Our platform allows you to find the right training Collection , that maybe your future Home.











If you are a Tenant

Our platform allows you to find the right trainee through the publications you download in our platform

Infosys Limited
Contact: Infosys Official Website
Description: Infosys is a multinational corporation that provides IT consulting and services, including software development, maintenance, and independent validation services to companies globally. It is one of the largest IT services companies in India and has a significant presence worldwide.
